item.description:
Learn the basics of the 9 Enneagram types, what type you are, how to grow and develop within your type and how to relate well to each type. Herb acts out the types with hats and songs! Lots of fun!

Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling, is one of the foremost Enneagram teachers in the Northeast, having taught 2000 Enneagram workshops to the public and in organizations. He is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and also Herb's Tips for Living. He's a therapist, personal life coach and leads team building personality types trainings in groups and organizations.
herb@herbpearce.com
www.herbpearce.com 781 648 3737


at The Arlington Center, 369 Mass. Ave.
Arlington MA
arlingtoncenter.org

7:30 pm - 10:00 pm
($35)

Advanced Enneagram the following day, Sat. 10-2. Discount if sign up for both.

item.why: If you want to understand people well, this is the best system around for that. Herb is a leading expert on the Enneagram, having taught 2000 workshops on it, as well as being the author of a major book on the Enneagram.
item.name: Enneagram Basic Workshop
